results.name: Triangle a(n,m)=number of m-element antichains on a labeled n-set; number of monotone n-variable Boolean functions with m mincuts (lower units), m=0..binomial(n,floor(n,2)).
reference: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On enumeration of the class of all monotone Boolean functions, in preparation.
link: Suresh Govindarajan and Deepak Aditya, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..94

V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6).
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jan 06 2001
